snippet.title: Grounded - Behind the Scenes Developer Game Overview | Xbox & Bethesda Games Showcase 2022
snippet.description:
Obsidian's Game Director Adam Brennecke and Comms Manager Aarik Dorobiala give an in-depth look at the design, development, and update process for their "Backyard Survival" RPG, Grounded.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
